subject: RE: [junit] Re: splitting this list
msgSnippet: ... Last time I saw Mike, he didn t seem in any danger of expiration.  On the other hand, it sounds like he s been having so much fun with Ruby lately, he may
messageBody:
> I also agree with J.B.'s point, that some of these people are
> the experts of a couple of years from now. You know, Mike
> Clark isn't getting any younger, so we need to find and train
> his replacement as soon as possible! ;-)

Last time I saw Mike, he didn't seem in any danger of
expiration. On the other hand, it sounds like he's been
having so much fun with Ruby lately, he may never come
back to the Java world!


Todd.
